code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var remove=function remove(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,remove:remove};
